name: Plumb
description:
You have submitted yourself as a test subject.
You are now locked inside a box.
The only way to go is down.

Complete a series of puzzles.
Receive prizes and praise for
completing each challenge.
Build up pride and wealth and
revel in your achievements.

How much is enough?
Keep chasing treasure and
descend further into the abyss.
What is at the bottom of it all?

While engaged in routine tasks,
lost to struggles against time and space,
how will you escape captivation
to free your mind and heart?

FEATURES:

This game was built and designed specifically for room scale VR.
Physics simulated object interactions.
Immersive hand presence using motion tracked VR controllers.
Simple, intuitive controls.
Clean, minimal visual style.

CONTENT:

10 challenging levels.
17 puzzles total.
This game is intended to be completed in a single session.
Note that progress will not be saved after the application quits.

REQUIREMENTS:

This game requires a room scale VR setup.
You will need a minimum 2x2 meter square
play space, and full 360 degree freedom
of movement.

Supported VR hardware includes:
Index, Vive, Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest 2(with Oculus link).
